metadata.name: Set the Default Search Provider's URL
metadata.description: Specifies the URL of the default search provider that is to be used. To set the URL of the default search provider, set <tt>DefaultSearchProviderName</tt> to <tt>{{{ xccdf_value("var_default_search_provider_name") }}}</tt> in the Chromium policy file.
metadata.rationale:
When doing internet searches, it is important to set an organizationally approved search
provider as well as use an encrypted connection via https.

manual_remediation: Specifies the URL of the default search provider that is to be used. To set the URL of the default search provider, set <tt>DefaultSearchProviderName</tt> to <tt>{{{ xccdf_value("var_default_search_provider_name") }}}</tt> in the Chromium policy file.
